AddServersToServerGroup.title: AddServersToServerGroup
AddServersToServerGroup.summary: Adds backend servers to the server group of a Gateway Load Balancer (GWLB) instance.

CreateListener.title: CreateListener
CreateListener.summary: Creates a listener for a Gateway Load Balancer (GWLB) instance.

CreateLoadBalancer.title: CreateLoadBalancer
CreateLoadBalancer.summary: Creates a Gateway Load Balancer (GWLB) instance.

CreateServerGroup.title: CreateServerGroup
CreateServerGroup.summary: Creates a server group for a Gateway Load Balancer (GWLB) instance.

DeleteListener.title: DeleteListener
DeleteListener.summary: Deletes a listener from a Gateway Load Balancer (GWLB) instance.

DeleteLoadBalancer.title: DeleteLoadBalancer
DeleteLoadBalancer.summary: Deletes a Gateway Load Balancer (GWLB) instance.

DeleteServerGroup.title: DeleteServerGroup
DeleteServerGroup.summary: Deletes a server group from a Gateway Load Balancer (GWLB) instance.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries the most recent region list of Gateway Load Balancer (GWLB).

DescribeZones.title: DescribeZones
DescribeZones.summary: Queries the most recent zone list of Gateway Load Balancer (GWLB).

GetListenerAttribute.title: GetListenerAttribute
GetListenerAttribute.summary: Queries the details of a Gateway Load Balancer (GWLB) listener.

GetListenerHealthStatus.title: GetListenerHealthStatus
GetListenerHealthStatus.summary: Queries the health check status of a Gateway Load Balancer (GWLB) listener.

GetLoadBalancerAttribute.title: GetLoadBalancerAttribute
GetLoadBalancerAttribute.summary: Queries the details of a Gateway Load Balancer (GWLB) instance.

ListServerGroupServers.title: ListServerGroupServers
ListServerGroupServers.summary: Queries the server groups of a Gateway Load Balancer (GWLB) instance.

ListServerGroups.title: ListServerGroups
ListServerGroups.summary: Queries the server groups of a Gateway Load Balancer (GWLB) instance.

MoveResourceGroup.title: MoveResourceGroup
MoveResourceGroup.summary: Changes the resource group to which a specified cloud resource belongs.

RemoveServersFromServerGroup.title: RemoveServersFromServerGroup
RemoveServersFromServerGroup.summary: Removes backend servers from the server group of a Gateway Load Balancer (GWLB) instance.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates and adds tags to resources.

UpdateListenerAttribute.title: UpdateListenerAttribute
UpdateListenerAttribute.summary: Updates the configurations of a Gateway Load Balancer (GWLB) listener.

UpdateLoadBalancerAttribute.title: UpdateLoadBalancerAttribute
UpdateLoadBalancerAttribute.summary: Updates the attributes of a Gateway Load Balancer (GWLB) instance.

UpdateLoadBalancerZones.title: UpdateLoadBalancerZones
UpdateLoadBalancerZones.summary: Updates the zones of a Gateway Load Balancer (GWLB) instance.
